title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Education Welfare (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Education Welfare (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 January 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited education welfare (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2020 (2) order shall come operation 1 january 2021

title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of the functions transferred by Article 3 are transferred 
to the Department of Education. 

(2) References to the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder 
and relating to any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) 
shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Department of Education.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department education (2) reference department child equality disability integration youth contained act instrument made thereunder relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department education

title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability,
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 

Integration and Youth - 

(a) by or under the Education (Welfare) Act 2000 (No. 22 of 2000), 

other than section 12(6)(e), and 

(b) 

in relation to the administration of - 

(i) 

the Home School Community Liaison Scheme, and 

(ii) 

the School Completion Programme, 

are transferred to the Minister for Education. 

(2) References to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth contained in any Act or instrument made thereunder and relating to 
any functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Education.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister child equality disability integration youth - (a) education (welfare) act 2000 (no 22 2000) section 12(6)(e) (b) relation administration - (i) home school community liaison scheme (ii) school completion programme transferred minister education (2) reference minister child equality disability integration youth contained act instrument made thereunder relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister education

title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 4. Where immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Education, the name of the Minister 
for Education shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred 
by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth or added in the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [588] 3 

proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution.

title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth may, in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Education, be carried on or completed from such commencement 
by the Minister for Education.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister child equality disability integration youth may far relates function transferred order minister education carried completed commencement minister education

title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Education.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister education

title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth contained in the memorandum and articles of association of any 
company and relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Education.
text_norm: 7 reference minister child equality disability integration youth contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister education

title: Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth in connection with the functions transferred by this Order 
are transferred to the Minister for Education and, accordingly, without any 
further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such commencement - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Education, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for 
Education, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for 
Education. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Education by this Article which, on the commencement of this Order, are 
standing in the name of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth shall, on the request of the Minister for Education, be 
transferred into the name of the Minister for Education. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [588] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
